catalogs.description2: The best selection, the best quality: Masaru offers the right spare parts for all types of European standard vehicles in proven OE compatibility quality. We also offer febi PLUS parts which are otherwise only offered by OE.

about_us.title1: It is not how we do it,
about_us.title2: if not how we do it
about_us.description1: is the fundamental principle that unites all the members of our organization. We are convinced that when we cannot be better, it will be the day that we stop, because at that moment we will no longer be challenging ourselves.
about_us.description3: We know that time is invaluable, which inspires us to make your life free of unnecessary worries through products for your vehicle that guarantee safety, excellent performance and durability.
about_us.description4.1: The world today is different from yesterday,
about_us.description4.11: we must go one step further
about_us.description4.31: transparency and integrity are a must
about_us.description4.41: leaves more memories than the product itself

estrut.description1: Suspension mounts absorb/reduce the vibrations throughout the vehicle to provide for a smooth ride while extending the life of your suspension parts.
estrut.description2: Rubber designed for strong abrasion resistance and long wear and tear
estrut.description3: Engineered to meet strict driving requirements
estrut.description4: Superior form, fit, and function for longer service life and ease of installation
estrut.suspensions: Keeping your vehicle level and easy to handle
estrut.subtitle: Safety Comes firs

shock.subtitle: Safety Comes firs
shock.description1: Shock absorbers control the impact and rebound movement of your car's springs and suspension.  They absorb the vibrations from the suspension system to prevent a bumpy ride from taking place.
shock.description2: Shock absorbers function as an oil pump to dissipate the vibrations from the suspension system by converting kinetic energy into heat.
shock.description3: Additionally shock absorbers helps suppor the weight of the vehicle and makes sure that  the tires are always in contact with the road.
shock.description4: Limits Excessive Vibrations And Damps Oscillations.
shock.description7: Consistent Performance And Improved Service Life
shock.suspensions: Keeping your vehicle level and easy to drive
shock.estrut: Keeping your props firmly in place.

ball_joint.description1: Ball joints bear the weight of the vehicle
ball_joint.description2: High resistance coating to protect from corrosion
ball_joint.description4: Made from wear resistant durable steel

tie_rod.description1: Tie rod ends help steer the vehicle by making the wheels turn.
tie_rod.description2: Made from high quality steel material
tie_rod.description3: Ball joints tightened to prevent water and dirt from entering
tie_rod.description4: High resistance coating to protect from corrosion

suspensions.description1: Suspension parts carry the weight of the vehicle, absorb shock forces, and maintain the correct riding height.
suspensions.description3: - Sophisticated alloy material providing superior durability.
suspensions.description5: - Superior form, fit, and function for longer service life and ease of installation.
suspensions.description6: Note: design varies based on the different application.

control_arm.description1: Control arms connect the front wheel to your car's suspension.
control_arm.description2: Made from high quality steel material
control_arm.description3: Bushings made from durable natural rubber.
control_arm.description4: Engineered to meet strict driving requirements.
control_arm.description5: Control arm bushings reduce the noise and vibrations throughout the vehicle to provide for a smooth ride.
control_arm.description6: All DANAPAC control arm bushings feature:
control_arm.description7: - Durable material that is corrosion and abrasion resistant
control_arm.description8: - Engineered to meet strict driving requirements.
control_arm.description9: - Superior form, fit, and function for longer service life and ease of installation.
control_arm.description10: Note: design varies based on the different application.

rack_end.description4: Durable material that is corrosion and abrasion resistant.

stabilizer.description1: Stabilizer links prevents the vehicle from swaying too much and improves the stiffness of the car.
stabilizer.description2: Rubber designed for strong abrasion resistance and long wear and tear.
stabilizer.description3: Made from high quality steel material.
stabilizer.description4: Ball joints tightened to prevent water and dirt from entering.
